commands.name: $makeserver
commands.description: Generates a full Eipp server template. Deletes all channels. Automatically sets config data (role and categor ids). Server Owner only.

commands.name: $setcategory <id>
commands.description: Sets the confessional category by ID. Admins only.

commands.name: $setrole <role> <id>
commands.description: Links a role (Host, Player, Spectator, Eliminated, Bot) to a Discord role ID. Admins only.

commands.name: $addrole <name> <#hex>
commands.description: Creates a new role with a given name and color. Admins only.

commands.name: $uploademotes
commands.description: Uploads attached images as emotes. Name = filename. Hosts only.

commands.name: $deleteallemotes
commands.description: Deletes all emotes on the server. Hosts only.

commands.name: $close
commands.description: Removes all game roles from everyone to end the game. Hosts only.

commands.name: $confessional <@user>
commands.description: Creates a confessional for the mentioned user. Adds player role.

commands.name: $groupconfessional <name> <@users>
commands.description: Creates a group confessional with mentioned users. Adds player role.

commands.name: $deleteconfessionals
commands.description: Deletes all channels in the confessional category. Confirmation required.

commands.name: $opentospecs
commands.description: Grants spectator role access to the current channel.

commands.name: $addspecs
commands.description: Adds spectator role to all users without the player role.

commands.name: $playerlist
commands.description: Pings all players in random order.

commands.name: $updateplayerlist
commands.description: Edits the last sent message by the bot to the current player list. Use this to update previous playerlist messages from $playerlist command. Ensure player list is in a separate channel, and no other messages from the bot are in that channel. It auto deletes its response message for this after 10 seconds.

commands.name: $lock
commands.description: Appends a lock emote to the channel name. Only in confessional category.

commands.name: $unlock
commands.description: Removes lock emote from the channel name. Only in confessional category.

commands.name: $soup
commands.description: The bot says 'Soup Time!'.

commands.name: $edward
commands.description: Sends the Edward emote.

commands.name: $test
commands.description: Checks if the bot is online.

commands.name: $earthquake
commands.description: KO's Saberslasher11 with Earthquake

commands.name: $IPAddress <@user>
commands.description: Displays a totally real 100% not randomized definitely doxxed frfr no cap IP Address of the mentioned user.

commands.name: $soupsweeper <soup bowl count>
commands.description: Starts a game of SoupSweeper. Player sets number of soup bowls, between 5-10 only. 10 bowls by default.

commands.name: $whosthatpokemon
commands.description: Pokemon name guessing game.

commands.name: $roll <number>
commands.description: Rolls a number between 1 and your input.

commands.name: $multihit <max hits> <accuracy> <King's rock (True or False)>
commands.description: Rolls for multihit moves' hit count based on accuracy or flinch checks. Used for moves like Population Bomb, Triple Axel, Triple Kick.

commands.name: $eippulist
commands.description: View Sylvieon's and friends' Eippus. Multi-page embed with navigation.

commands.name: $addeippu <section> <name> <description> <link>
commands.description: Add a new Eippu to the given section (sylvieon, upcoming, ongoing, other). Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $updateeippu <section> <index> <name|description|link> <new_value>
commands.description: Update an existing Eippu's field by index in its section. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $moveeippu <from_section> <index> <to_section>
commands.description: Move an Eippu from one section to another. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $deleteeippu <section> <index>
commands.description: Delete an Eippu from a section by index. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $talkhere <channel_id>
commands.description: Makes the bot send a message in the specified channel. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $addeippbotcommmand <name> <description>
commands.description: Adds a command to the command list. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: updateeippbotcommand <name> <description>
commands.description: Updates a selected command in the command list. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: deleteeippbotcommand <name>
commands.description: Deletes a selected command in the command list. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $metronome
commands.description: Calls a random move Metronome can select.

commands.name: $renameeippu <old name> <new name>
commands.description: Renames an Eippu in Eippulist. Sylvieon only.

commands.name: $renameeippbotcommand <old name> <new name>
commands.description: Renames a command in commandlist. Sylvieon only.
